text: Barhadashi () is a rural municipality (gaunpalika) out of seven rural municipality in Jhapa District of Province No. 1 of Nepal. There are a total of 15 municipalities in Jhapa in which 8 are urban and 7 are rural. According to Ministry of Federal Affairs and Local Developme Jhapa has an area of and the total population of the municipality is 33653 as of Census of Nepal 2011. == Related pages == * List of mayors of municipalities in Koshi Province * List of chairpersons of rural municipalities in Koshi Province == References == Category:Municipalities of Nepal
title: Barhadashi Rural Municipality
